verses.text: In the \w end|strong="G3796"\w* of the \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*, as it began to \w dawn|strong="G2020"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* the \w first|strong="G1520"\w* \add day\add* of the \w week|strong="G4521"\w*, \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w Magdalene|strong="G3094"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* to \w see|strong="G2334"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G5028"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, there \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G4578"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w earthquake|strong="G4578"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w descended|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, and \w came|strong="G4334"\w* and rolled \w back|strong="G0617"\w* the \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w door|strong="G2374"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w upon|strong="G1883"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w His|strong="G0846"\w* \w countenance|strong="G2397"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w like|strong="G5613"\w* \w lightning|strong="G0796"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w raiment|strong="G1742"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w as|strong="G5616"\w* \w snow|strong="G5510"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w for|strong="G0575"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w* the \w keepers|strong="G5083"\w* did \w shake|strong="G4579"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w became|strong="G1096"\w* \w as|strong="G5616"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \add men\add*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto the \w women|strong="G1135"\w*, \w Fear|strong="G5399"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, which was \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*.

He \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he is \w risen|strong="G1453"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*. \w Come|strong="G1205"\w*, \w see|strong="G1492"\w* the \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w lay|strong="G2749"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4198"\w* \w quickly|strong="G5035"\w*, and \w tell|strong="G2036"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he is \w risen|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, he goeth \w before|strong="G4254"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*; \w there|strong="G1563"\w* shall ye \w see|strong="G3700"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w lo|strong="G2400"\w*, I have \w told|strong="G2036"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w departed|strong="G1831"\w* \w quickly|strong="G5035"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*; and did \w run|strong="G5143"\w* to \w bring|strong="G0518"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w word|strong="G0518"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* they \w went|strong="G4198"\w* to \w tell|strong="G0518"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w met|strong="G0528"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w All hail|strong="G5463"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w came|strong="G4334"\w* and \w held|strong="G2902"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* by the \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Be|strong="G5399"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w afraid|strong="G5399"\+w*: \+w go|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w tell|strong="G0518"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w brethren|strong="G0080"\+w* \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w they go|strong="G0565"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Galilee|strong="G1056"\+w*, \+w and there|strong="G2546"\+w* \+w shall they see|strong="G3700"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G4198"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* were \w going|strong="G4198"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w some|strong="G5100"\w* of the \w watch|strong="G2892"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w city|strong="G4172"\w*, and \w shewed|strong="G0518"\w* unto the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* the things that were \w done|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they were \w assembled|strong="G4863"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* the \w elders|strong="G4245"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* had \w taken|strong="G2983"\w* \w counsel|strong="G4824"\w*, they \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w large|strong="G2425"\w* \w money|strong="G0694"\w* unto the \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Say \w ye|strong="G2036"\w*, \w His|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* by \w night|strong="G3571"\w*, and \w stole|strong="G2813"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \add away\add* \w while|strong="G2837"\w* \w we|strong="G2257"\w* \w slept|strong="G2837"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w come|strong="G0191"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* the \w governor’s|strong="G2232"\w* \w ears|strong="G0191"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* will \w persuade|strong="G3982"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w secure|strong="G0275"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w So|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w took|strong="G2983"\w* the \w money|strong="G0694"\w*, and \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* they were \w taught|strong="G1321"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w saying|strong="G3056"\w* is commonly \w reported|strong="G1310"\w* \w among|strong="G3844"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w until|strong="G3360"\w* this \w day|strong="G4594"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3101"\w* \w eleven|strong="G1733"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* went \w away|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*, \w into|strong="G1519"\w* a \w mountain|strong="G3735"\w* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* had \w appointed|strong="G5021"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G3588"\w* \w doubted|strong="G1365"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G4334"\w* and \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w All|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w power|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w is given|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w unto me|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w earth|strong="G1093"\+w*.\wj*

\wj ¶ \+w Go ye|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w*, \+w and teach|strong="G3100"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w nations|strong="G1484"\+w*, \+w baptizing|strong="G0907"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the name|strong="G3686"\+w* \+w of the Father|strong="G3962"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w of the Son|strong="G5207"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w of the|strong="G4151"\+w* \+w Holy|strong="G0040"\+w* \+w Ghost|strong="G4151"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w Teaching|strong="G1321"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w to observe|strong="G5083"\+w* \+w all things|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w whatsoever|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w I have commanded|strong="G1781"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w*, \+w lo|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w alway|strong="G3956"\+w*, \+add even\+add* \+w unto|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w the end|strong="G4930"\+w* \+w of the world|strong="G0165"\+w*.\wj* \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.
